title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message:
I have another macbook with charging issues it was after liquid damage in keyboard back light area. I fixed display issue.
I already replaced battery and port they are fine. 
Once i connecting  charger to the laptop orange light came up but in system laptop shows information battery is not charging.
I measure voltage around port connector and compare to second laptop with is charging fine on diode D7005 pin PPVIN i have only 0,6V , working one have 12V.
Any idea where I should start with it? 
Thanks

title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message: Tried known good battery? Resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of ISL6259? Sounds like possibly a current sensing issue.

title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message:
"Tried known good battery? Resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of [URL="https://store.rossmanngroup.com/isl6259ahrtz.html"]ISL6259[/URL]? Sounds like possibly a current sensing issue. "
Why are you asking about a battery that was already tried and the problem has already been pointed out at D7005!

Without voltage at D7005, does this thing power on from charger only?

title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message: Battery part I didn’t see sense resistor part wrong post and forum entirely got jumbled af work my bad Duke.

title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message:
Laptop not turning on on charger, I replaced  ISL6259 but still same issue, resistance between
pin 17/18 - 4 ohm
pin 27/28 - 20 ohm

title: 820-3476 Charging issue
message: You replaced the ISL while there is no voltage at D7005....Issue is more likely around Q7010, check voltage there.
